Linear: [Step=0] The points show the PCA projection of the original word vector embeddings.
[Step=1] Reorient points to a new space where the bias direction is aligned to the x-axis.
[Step=2] From each word's embedding vector, remove the component along the bias direction.
[Step=3] Reorient the embeddings using PCA projection of the debiased word vectors in the new debiased space.
Hard: [Step=0] The points show the PCA projection of the original word vector embeddings.
[Step=1] Reorient points to a new space where the bias direction is aligned to the x-axis.
[Step=2] Remove the gender component from all but the gender-specific words.
[Step=3] Modify the equalize set such that they are equidistant (?).
[Step=4] Reorient the embeddings using PCA projection of the debiased word vectors in the new debiased space.
